details.title: Jenkins Project Build List
details.description: Gets access to the project build list from Jenkins

inputendpoint.name: build-list
inputendpoint.label: Build List
inputendpoint.description: List of builds to display inside the widget

outputendpoint.name: condition-list
outputendpoint.label: Selected Build Filter
outputendpoint.description: Conditions for filtering a build list using the selected build id (e.g. by connecting this endpoint to the Condition List endpoint of the AND Filter operator)
